ygData.subject: Re: Stun issue
ygData.msgSnippet: Greets All, I too hate the stun effect, but i ve gotten used to it by now and accept it as part of EQ life.  However, what I would like to see added to the
ygData.messageBody:
Greets All,


I too hate the stun effect, but i've gotten used to it by now and
accept it as part of EQ life. However, what I would like to see
added to the Divine Aura line is maybe a running acceleration for 5
or 10 seconds during the first part of DA.
How many of you have casted DA only to crawl about 2 steps and
die, leaving your corpse in a worse situation than when you started?
Most clerics usually have about a bub or less by the time they DA,
and with that much health left, you basically walk when trying
to run. An extra burst of speed just for a few seconds would give
us just a tad more chance of escaping or at least dying in a more
corpse "friendly" area. =)

Just a thought,
//Aldaren
Follower of Rodcet Nife
Lvl35 on Tunare
